title: Resource Metadata
description: A class used to represent the metadata for a resource

title.title: Title
title.description: A string containing the name given to a resource

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.description: A string containing a summary of a resource

subjects.title: Subject keywords
subjects.description: A list of keyword strings expressing the topic of a resource

creators.title: Creators
creators.description: A list of Creator objects indicating the entities responsible for creating a resource

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: A list of Contributor objects indicating the entities that contributed to a resource

relations.title: Related resources
relations.description: A list of Relation objects representing resources related to a described resource

additional_metadata.title: Additional metadata
additional_metadata.description: A dictionary containing key-value pair metadata associated with a resource

rights.title: Rights
rights.description: An object containing information about rights held in an over a resource

default.statement: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution CC BY.

statement.const: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution CC BY.
statement.default: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution CC BY.

statement.const: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike CC BY-SA.
statement.default: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike CC BY-SA.

statement.const: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivs CC BY-ND.
statement.default: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivs CC BY-ND.

statement.const: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoCommercial-ShareAlike CC BY-NC-SA.
statement.default: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoCommercial-ShareAlike CC BY-NC-SA.

statement.const: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoCommercial CC BY-NC.
statement.default: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoCommercial CC BY-NC.

statement.const: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoCommercial-NoDerivs CC BY-NC-ND.
statement.default: This resource is shared under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoCommercial-NoDerivs CC BY-NC-ND.

anyOf.title: Custom License
anyOf.description: An object containing information about rights held in an over a resource

statement.title: Statement
statement.description: A string containing the text of the license or rights statement

url.title: URL
url.description: An object containing the URL pointing to a description of the license or rights statement

awards.title: Funding agency information
awards.description: A list of objects containing information about the funding agencies and awards associated with a resource

spatial_coverage.title: Spatial coverage
spatial_coverage.description: An object containing information about the spatial topic of a resource, the spatial applicability of a resource, or jurisdiction under with a resource is relevant

anyOf.title: Point Coverage Metadata
anyOf.description:
A class used to represent geographic coverage metadata for a resource or aggregation expressed as a
point location

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing a name for the place associated with the geographic coverage

east.title: East
east.description: The coordinate of the point location measured in the east direction (between -180 and 180)

north.title: North
north.description: The coordinate of the point location measured in the north direction (between -90 and 90)

units.title: Units
units.description: The units applying to the unlabelled numeric values of north and east

projection.title: Projection
projection.description: The name of the projection used with any parameters required, such as ellipsoid parameters, datum, standard parallels and meridians, zone, etc.

anyOf.title: Box Coverage Metadata
anyOf.description:
A class used to represent geographic coverage metadata for a resource or aggregation expressed as a
latitude-longitude bounding box

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing a name for the place associated with the geographic coverage

northlimit.title: North limit
northlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the northernmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -90 and 90)

eastlimit.title: East limit
eastlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the easternmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -180 and 180)

southlimit.title: South limit
southlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the southernmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -90 and 90)

westlimit.title: West limit
westlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the westernmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -180 and 180)

units.title: Units
units.description: A string containing the units applying to the unlabelled numeric values of northlimit, eastlimit, southlimit, and westlimit

projection.title: Projection
projection.description: A string containing the name of the projection used with any parameters required, such as ellipsoid parameters, datum, standard parallels and meridians, zone, etc.

period_coverage.title: Temporal coverage
period_coverage.description: An object containing information about the temporal topic or applicability of a resource

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: An object containing information about the publisher of a resource

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A string containing the biblilographic citation for a resource

Creator.title: Creator Metadata
Creator.description: A class used to represent the metadata associated with a creator of a resource

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing the name of the creator

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: A string containing a phone number for the creator

address.title: Address
address.description: A string containing an address for the creator

options.placeholder: e.g., 8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: A string containing the name of the organization with which the creator is affiliated

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the creator

homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.description: An object containing the URL for website associated with the creator

Contributor.title: Contributor Metadata
Contributor.description: A class used to represent the metadata associated with a contributor to a resource

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing the name of the contributor

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: A string containing a phone number for the contributor

address.title: Address
address.description: A string containing an address for the contributor

options.placeholder: e.g., 8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: A string containing the name of the organization with which the contributor is affiliated

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the contributor

homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.description: An object containing the URL for website associated with the contributor

Relation.title: Related Resource Metadata
Relation.description: A class used to represent the metadata associated with a resource related to the resource being described

type.title: RelationType
enum: The content of this resource is part of
The content of this resource was created by a related App or software program
The content of this resource was created by
This resource updates and replaces a previous version
This resource has been replaced by a newer version
This resource conforms to established standard described by
This resource has a related resource in another format
This resource is a different format of
The content of this resource references
The content of this resource is derived from

value.title: Value
value.description: String expressing the Full text citation, URL link for, or description of the related resource

AwardInfo.title: Funding Agency Metadata
AwardInfo.description: A class used to represent the metadata associated with funding agency credits for a resource

funding_agency_name.title: Agency name
funding_agency_name.description: A string containing the name of the funding agency or organization

title.title: Award title
title.description: A string containing the title of the project or award

number.title: Award number
number.description: A string containing the award number or other identifier

funding_agency_url.title: Agency URL
funding_agency_url.description: An object containing a URL pointing to a website describing the funding award

PeriodCoverage.title: Period coverage
PeriodCoverage.description: A class used to represent temporal coverage metadata for a resource or aggregation

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing a name for the time interval

start.title: Start
start.description: A datetime object containing the instant corresponding to the commencement of the time interval

end.title: End
end.description: A datetime object containing the instant corresponding to the termination of the time interval

Publisher.title: Publisher Metadata
Publisher.description: A class used to represent the metadata associated with the publisher of a resource

name.title: Publisher name
name.description: A string containing the name of the publisher

url.title: Publisher URL
url.description: An object containing a URL that points to the publisher website
